## BigNumber.negated() method

Returns a BigNumber whose value is the value of this BigNumber negated, i.e. multiplied by -1.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(1.8)
x.negated()                     // '-1.8'
y = new BigNumber(-1.3)
y.negated()                     // '1.3'
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
negated(): BigNumber;
```
**Returns:**

[BigNumber](./eth-connect.bignumber.md)
